name: Very Indie Survival Game
description:
This is a little Survival Game Project i am very actively working on at the moment. The current features are quite simple, but i will definetely update this game on a regular basis.

The game is a Sandbox Survival Game centered arround technological progress, controls are as follows:

W/A/S/D - movement

Space - jump

Tab - Inventory

Left Click - attack

Q - drop

Right Click - charge up for throwing an object ( then left click to throw )

U - open powerups menu

Esc - enter ingamemenu

E - pick up
